name: Planet of Bloodthirsty Santa (Demo)
description:
A scavenger crew lands on a strange seemingly deserted planet. Something terrible has occurred. Can you make off alive or succumb to the terror of the Planet of BLOODTHIRSTY SANTA? 

  • Explore the icy planet: Santa's village, the Toy Factory, Santa's Castle
  • Avoid the wrath of SANTA. He's  for hungry for flesh and thirsty for blood
  • Finish the mission at all costs!!!
  • Multiple video formats: VHS, Laserdisc and more
  • Mouse/Keyboard and controller support
  • Play in 1st or 3rd person

This is a demo of the first section of the game. Join my patreon to  play the full version when it's released and get access to several more games like NIGHTRIPPER!

$5+ donation for access to the full game when it's released. Coming this November!

Follow on twitter @puppetcombo

Patreon

Join my Patreon for access to the full version later this month, as well as my latest experiments in TERROR! Shock and panic await you in my newest games The Night Ripper & Buzz-Saw Blood House.
